channel.title: Krishna Pranay Angara
channel.description: Recent content on Krishna Pranay Angara

item.title: Emotion Classifier
item.description: Summary The project discussed is based on the Image classification problem using deep convolution neural networks. The convolution networks use multiple hidden layers by taking in the data extracted using beautiful soup framework to classify the emotions of the human object present in the images. The multiclass model generated learns through the data of images to recognize the emotions. The images are classified into happy and sad while feeding the model.
